user_question: How can I create a viral marketing campaign for a new eco-friendly toothbrush and generate an image of the toothbrush?
final_answer: To create a viral marketing campaign for an eco-friendly toothbrush: 1) Use social media influencers who focus on sustainability. 2) Create engaging, educational content about the environmental impact of traditional toothbrushes. 3) Launch a challenge encouraging users to share their eco-friendly habits. Image of the eco-friendly toothbrush generated. Slogan: 'Brush Green, Smile Clean!'
